name: Pizza
description: Create your own homemade pizza dough and customize it with any ingredients that you desire!

steps.instruction: Dissolve the yeast and sugar with warm water in a large bowl. Let it rest for 5 minutes before adding oil and salt to the mixture.
After 5 minutes, add one cup of flower at a time and mix until a soft dough is formed.
Start flattening the dough into a circular shape using your hands. Once circular, put dough onto non-stick cooking tray.
Mix tomato sauce with dried oregano and basil in a separate bowl.
Apply and spread onto pizza dough. Leave some room empty around edges to have crust. Afterwards, turn oven on to 400 degrees Farenheit.
Apply shredded mozarella cheese to pizza, covering all tomato sauce. Afterwards, add any other toppings that you want to the pizza.
Bake pizza for 25-30 minutes, until crust is lightly browned. Once cooled, serve with drinks!
